turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! Thanks for calling. This is Daniel from ConnectNet Support — how can I help you with your internet today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi Daniel. My internet has stopped working. It was fine yesterday night, but now it won't connect.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, I see. Sorry about the trouble. Can you tell me if the lights on your modem or router are on right now?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I have listened many times before I called you, so whatever. Could you check if there's an outage in this area?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, I can do that. Could you please give me your address or at least your ZIP code so I can check for any local outages?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay, my address is curly mark 1342, and zip code is 339.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, thanks. I’m checking that now… there doesn’t seem to be any outage in your area. Can I ask which internet device you’re using — a router, a modem, or both together?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm using Aleutia. Could you know what the issue might be?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, Aleutia — got it. That’s a combined modem and router, right? Can you tell me if you see any red or blinking lights on it right now?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm sorry, I pronounced it badly. I'm using router, and I can't see. Oh, right, some lights.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries! Good catch. Which lights are blinking or showing red on your router?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: No, that color isn't right. Could you send me some technicians available?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, we can arrange that. Could you tell me when you’d prefer a technician to come—today, tomorrow, or later in the week?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I forgot to check what should I try before you send somewhere? Or do I need to reset the router again?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good question! Before we send someone, let’s try a quick step. Could you unplug your router from the power for about 30 seconds, then plug it back in and see if the lights change?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I try now. No, it doesn't work. It won't work. Could you send me someone, please?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, no problem. I’ll arrange a visit. Could you please confirm your full name and a phone number where our technician can reach you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm Sasaki Kouta, and my phone number is 765-123-908.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thanks, Mr. Kouta. One last thing — would you prefer a morning or afternoon appointment for the technician?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: If you send someone today, I prefer afternoon because I have to work right now. And if you send someone to me tomorrow, I'm available both morning and afternoon.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, thanks. I’ll check availability for this afternoon first, and if no one’s free, we’ll schedule you for tomorrow. Would you like the technician to call before they arrive?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, please. So now, could I, should I just be staying at home?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good question. You don’t need to wait yet — once your appointment is confirmed, we’ll text or call you with the time window. Will you be the one at home when the technician comes, or should we note another contact person?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I will be playing at home, so no problem if the technician comes.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, thank you. I’ve noted that you’ll be available. Before I confirm, could you please tell me which service plan you’re using with us? It helps us match the right technician.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: For one person's health, I chose

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Ah, you mean the individual home plan — great, that helps. Alright, I’ve got everything I need to schedule your visit. Would you like me to confirm the exact time by text or phone call?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Please text me later. Okay, that's all. I'll be waiting for your message. Thank you. Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome, Mr. Kouta. We’ll text you soon with your appointment time. Have a good day and hope your internet’s back up soon!
